Your hits bleed enemies for 1% max health every second.
Picking up another chomper increases the bleed damage

items.desc: Gain lifesteal equal to 1% of your damage dealt

items.desc:
Your bullets explode on impact
Deal 50% damage to nearby enemies per item stack

Gain 8% crit strike chance

Gain 24% crit strike chance

Gain two stats at reduced strength from this list:
Damage, Health, Speed, Attack Speed, Crit Chance, Crit Damage

items.desc:
Shoots a spread of bullets

Shotgun bullets deal less damage and shoot faster

Long range high damage

Gain 60% lifesteal and double the effectiveness of all future lifesteal items.
Your health rapidly drains

Fire a sword projectile forward if you attack with full health.

Allows your sword to deflect enemy bullets every 3 seconds.

items.desc: Increase your weapon damage by 400%, but reduce attack speed to 33%

items.desc: Decrease your skill cooldown by 10%

items.desc: Increase your skill duration by 10%

items.name: Corrupted Dash
items.desc: Dash cooldown is reduced by 50%, but you no longer gain immunity during dash

items.desc: Your shots during vanish deal 300% damage, but vanish cooldown is increased by 100% and duration is reduced by 50%

items.desc: Decoy explodes at the end of its duration for 100 times player damage, but decoy cooldown is increased by 25%
